name: @beabee/beabee-common
description: Shared code between Beabee projects for Node.js, Deno and the browser

tasks.check: deno task check:format && deno task check:types
tasks.test: deno task test:deno:types && deno task test:deno && deno task test:node
tasks.test:types: deno task test:deno:types && deno task test:node:types
tasks.test:node: deno task test:node:esm && deno task test:node:cjs
tasks.build: deno task clear && deno task generate:index && deno task sync && deno task format && deno task build:types && deno task build-all
tasks.build:node: deno task build:node:esm && deno task build:node:cjs
tasks.build:node:esm: deno task cli build node esm
tasks.build:node:cjs: deno task cli build node cjs
tasks.build:browser: deno task build:browser:cdn && deno task build:browser:esm
tasks.build:browser:cdn: deno task cli build browser cdn
tasks.build:browser:esm: deno task cli build browser esm
tasks.watch:node:esm: deno task cli watch node esm
tasks.watch:node:cjs: deno task cli watch node cjs
tasks.watch:browser:cdn: deno task cli watch browser cdn
tasks.watch:browser:esm: deno task cli watch browser esm
tasks.cache: deno task cache:deno && deno task cache:node
tasks.generate:index: deno run --allow-read --allow-write scripts/generate-index.ts && deno task format
